sub_title: Business Advisor for Development and Subsurface at Shell
summary:
I am a high‐performing, strategic‐thinking EP Professional with a good grasp of the wider business context. I have a keen interest in the global developments throughout the energy industry, both in oil and gas as well as ways to decarbonize the energy system and achieve net zero. 

Thanks to strong analytical problem-solving ability, I am recognized as an outstanding integrator who quickly builds fluency in new skills and consistently delivers high quality work under tight deadlines. My comfort with ambiguity allows me to incorporate risk and uncertainties appropriately in evaluations and decision making.
